flawed_nl_solution:
As she gave 1 balloon out, 12 balloons floated away plus she gave away 9 more balloons so she is down 1+12+9 = <<1+12+9=20>>20 balloons
She started with 50 and gave/lost 20 balloons so she has 50-20 = <<50-20=30>>30 balloons
She also took her coworkers last 11 balloons so her new total is 30+11 = <<30+11=41>>41 balloons
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
